msContents.summary: : Prayer for the Journey to Heaven. F-156r: Funeral Ritual, with the following divisions: Homily on the return to Dust (15r), Prayer of contrition that God gave to Peter (16r), Prayer of our Lady Mary (35r), Lessons for the deceased (47r), Homily of Abba Salama, Metropolitan of Ethiopia (64r), Homily o fJames of Sarug on the priests and deacons of the Church that fall asleep (70v), Rite for deacons (85r), A second rite for adult women (96r), Rite for adolescent women (99r), Service for the 3rd day (103r), Service for the 7th day (105r), Service for the 12th day (108r), Service for the 30th day (110v), Service for the 40th day and for the half year (113v), Lessons for priest (118r), A history from the Fathers (140v), Prayer of blessing of our Father Samuel (151r), 2nd to 7th blessings (152v), Prayer of Thanksgiving (156v), Prayer for the departed (157r), Prayer, petition and supplication to our Lord Jesus Christ which profits ody and soul and saves from Sheol (157v), Prayer for the Journey to Heaven (158r), Another Prayer for the Journey to Heaven (158v), Another prayer for the Journey to heaven (159r), Story of the Sinful Woman who Anointed Our Lord (160r), Prayer to Christ against demons, "We ask thee, O our Prince" (165r), The Bandlet of Righteousness (165v). Varia: : Miracle of Mary, copied for Walda Sadeq. : Conclusion of a prayer, apparently addressed to our Lady. : Note in Amharic that Ato Walda Gabre'el inherits certain property. : Note in Amharic concerning the survey of some property involving 50 birr. Note of ownership by the Church of Zion "and its lord, Sena Krestos" (). (Info from Macomber, Catalogue).

extent.measure: ff. 172; 2 cols; 18 lines (ff. 3-156) and 17 to 23 lines (ff. 2 and 157-171)
